Tell Me More

Services

We built a secure and verified marketplace that enables college students to quickly buy and sell belongings with trusted users right on campus.

Appstore Application

Our secure and verified campus marketplace app is available on the App Store, enabling college students to buy and sell belongings quickly and safely with verified users.

Web Application

We’re building modern, responsive web apps with robust functionality—coming soon to elevate your business online.

Android Application

We create professional, high-performance Android mobile applications optimized for usability and Google Play, coming soon.

About

  • 2021

    Founder Minjae Sung moved into college and saw the problem firsthand: third-party marketplaces were full of unverified profiles and scam posts. After being scammed himself, he set out to build a safer way for students to trade.

  • 2022

    With no budget for outside developers, Minjae taught himself to code so classmates could trade confidently with verified school emails.

  • 2024

    Engineer Milan Rona joined as co-founder, rebuilding the backend for speed, security, and effortless scaling.

  • 2025

    Our five-person team launched Swap Door and attracted 598 students and 960 total listings in 90 days across the U.S colleges. We’re growing fast and still driven by the same mission: give every campus a trusted marketplace.
